text:
OfferUp is a Seattle area startup and we are changing how people buy and sell locally by making it as easy as sharing a photo from your phone. We are creating a simple and safer marketplace where we help buyers and sellers link up with ease. We are a rapidly growing team and are looking to bring on more passionate, motivated, and curious people.

Check out our engineering jobs: https://offerupnow.com/jobs/engineering/

Bellevue, WA | FTE | Onsite
